BEST COUNTER STRIKE OF ALL TIME

1.Huge hacker population.
 -If you are premium, you will encounter hackers every 4 - 10 matches.
 -If you are not premium ever second match will involve some degree of hacking, be it toggles or walls.
 -At this point Valve has lost interest in cleaning its community, so don't expect to get new anti-cheat systems.

2.None existent support.
 -No support. You can't contact support, support does not exist. You only get a page with "suggestions" on how to fix your issue.
 -Random ban. No support.
 -Cooldown out of nowhere . No support.
 -Cooldown becouse you have kicked more than 10 players in a week. No support.
 
3.Scam
 -Bought the game full price. Now its free. No refund . Nothing . Just a badge to tell other people you spend money for something they have for free.

TLDR: Do not invest time into this. sure, play it with your friend casually, but don't expect to have a good time playing competitive.

2020 review: Cheater population in the rise. Player base consists of at least 80% cheaters. No one is hiding it, the developer don't do anything. 
2020 TLDR: Fortnite with real guns.
